betterquesting:10.desc:8:
One of the well-guarded secrets of Gardencia, Rosidian Metal, was itself a key to another secret. Another powerful bee taken from the Bubbell Alliance.
Originally coming from a being not unlike the Meatball Man, or even the Meatball Man himself, the powers of the Deep-Learner bee were being used to augment the abilities of the creatures of Gardencia, bosting their food-replicating abilities.
I really have to thank my bee friends, their ability to attune to magical fields and recursion is incredible!
Sure, soul manipulation is not necessarily a morally righteous power, and maybe I should be more weary of anything coming from the Meatball Man, but it has had so many incredible uses.
My factories have grown dependent on monster automation, and thanks to my bee friends, I can set up my models even more easily!
